channel.title: Interview on jMonkeyEngine
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on jMonkeyEngine

item.title: Sgold interviews Jayfella
item.description: Sgold: Thank you for agreeing to be interviewed. First question: When did you first hear about JMonkeyEngine? Jayfella: Way back in 2014, after a long period of developing desktop applications, servers, and minecraft plugins, I decided to look into writing games. At that time I was more into C#, but XNA was a sinking ship, so looked at alternatives. I found jMonkey and gave it a shot.
